Uses of Package
org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue.nt

  • Packages that use org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue.nt 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.align
    This package contains classes used to create or parse alignments.
    org.jcvi.jillion.align.exonerate.vulgar  
    org.jcvi.jillion.align.pairwise
    This package contains classes for performing pair-wise alignments of two sequences.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly
    The assembly package contains objects for working with genomic data that has been assembled into Contigs and Scaffolds.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm
    Contains Classes and interfaces to work with Celera Assembler data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.frg  
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas
    This package contains classes for handling contigs stored in CLC Bio's .cas file format.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.clc.cas.read  
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.ace
    This package contains classes for handling Contigs stored in the Ace File Format.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.consed.phd
    This package contains classes for working with Consed Phd files.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.contig
    This package contains classes that can read and write TIGR .contig formatted contig data (also known as .ctg format).
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm
    This package contains classes to handle TIGR Assembler formatted assembly files.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util
    The Assembly util package contains utility classes that are useful for working with general assembly data regardless of what assembler was used or file format the data is in.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util.consensus
    The Consensus package will compute Consensus for a given Slice.
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.util.slice
    This package contains classes for working with slices.
    org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue  
    org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue.aa  
    org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue.nt  
    org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.align  
    org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.align.blast  
    org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.primer
    This module deals with working with sequencing primers.
    org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt
    This package deals with Fasta files that contain NucleotideSequence data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.align  
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly  
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.assembly.util  
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.fasta.nt  
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.sam
    Internal package for working with SAM data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat  
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.chromat.ztr.chunk
    The chunk package implements all the possible Chunk formats in the ZTR 1.2 specification.
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.trace.fastq  
    org.jcvi.jillion.orf  
    org.jcvi.jillion.profile
    This package works with ANDES profile files.
    org.jcvi.jillion.sam
    This package contains classes for working with Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) and Binary Alignment/Map (BAM) formatted data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.sam.cigar
    This package contains classes for working with CIGAR alignment format.
    org.jcvi.jillion.sam.header
    This package contains classes for working with Sam and Bam header information.
    org.jcvi.jillion.testutils  
    org.jcvi.jillion.testutils.assembly.cas
    Utility classes for testing CLC Reference Assembled data CAS formatted data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.trace  
    org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat
    This package and its sub packages deal with Sanger Chromatogram object and file representations.
    org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.abi
    This package can decode Applied Biosystems AB1 formatted trace files into org.jcvi.jillion.trace.sanger.chromat.Chromatogram objects.
    org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.scf
    The SCF package can encode and decode Chromatograms in SCF format first described in Dear, S and Staden, R. "A standard file format for data from DNA sequencing instruments", DNA Sequence 3, 107-110, (1992).
    org.jcvi.jillion.trace.chromat.ztr
    ZTR Format can store sanger trace data more efficiently than the SCFv3 format.
    org.jcvi.jillion.trace.fastq
    This package contains classes for dealing with fastq data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.trace.sff
    This package contains classes for working with 454 or Ion Torrent sff encoded files.
    org.jcvi.jillion.trim  
    org.jcvi.jillion.trim.lucy
    This package contains trimmer implementations that follow the algorithms used by the TIGR program LUCY that was used to trim sanger reads.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue.nt used by org.jcvi.jillion.align 
    Class and Description
    Nucleotide
    Nucleotide is a Residue implementation for DNA Nucleotides.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue.nt used by org.jcvi.jillion.align.exonerate.vulgar 
    Class and Description
    NucleotideSequence
    NucleotideSequence an interface to abstract how a Sequence of Nucleotides are encoded in memory.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue.nt used by org.jcvi.jillion.align.pairwise

    Nucleotide is a Residue implementation for DNA Nucleotides.

  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue.nt used by org.jcvi.jillion.assembly 
    Class and Description
    Nucleotide
    Nucleotide is a Residue implementation for DNA Nucleotides.
    NucleotideSequence
    NucleotideSequence an interface to abstract how a Sequence of Nucleotides are encoded in memory.
    NucleotideSequenceBuilder
    NucleotideSequenceBuilder is a way to construct a NucleotideSequence similar to how a StringBuilder can be used to create a String.
    NucleotideSequenceDataStore 
    ReferenceMappedNucleotideSequence
    ReferenceMappedNucleotideSequence is a NucleotideSequence that has been mapped to another reference NucleotideSequence.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.core.residue.nt used by org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.ca.asm
